Nightlight::

Nightlight tried to defend herself, and dificulty she could avoid the 
attacks of McGowan and Stronghold, She fired 2 energy balls to 
McGowan, 2 against Barrymore, 2 agaisnt Alba, 2 against Depp, 2 
against Airbomber, 2 agaisnt Stranato and 2 against Stronghold. But 
she was hit by the combined attack of Barrymore and Stranato, doing 
her fell. 

She felt stunned and she would be defendless a short while.
